LanguageData.JRWDracorexReconstruct.label: Dracorex
LanguageData.JRWDracorexReconstruct.description:
-- > INGEN INTERNAL CASE FILE #032119-2006 [DRACOREX HOGWARTSIA] CODENAME: DRAGON-KING >781
A strange pachycephalosaurid with a flat crest atop its head, decorated in sharp spines. Despite its fearsome appearence, they are quite gentle.
